original: intros m x y z t Hmap Hexd Hx1y Hgoal. unfold expf in Hgoal. unfold expf. split; intro Hexpfs; destruct Hexpfs as [Hexfz Hexft|Hexft Hexfz]. - split. + apply Hexfz. + apply Hexft. - split. + apply Hexft. + apply Hexfz.
